skillTree.name: War Boar
skillTree.description: This stinky hog is as grumpy and fierce as its brutal rider.

skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Back on Yer Feet!
skillTree.description: "YOU'ZE NOT DEAD 'TIL I SAYS YOU ARE!!!"

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4% for Orc units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Boss of da Field
skillTree.description: "You scared of dem gits? I’ll give ya somefink ta be scared of!"

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for all Orc units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Linecracka!
skillTree.description: "If you fink some pointy spearz iz gonna stop me, den you'ze dead wrong."

skillTree.name: One-Orc Army
skillTree.description:
"Sir, there's a Greenskin approaching the camp!"
	
	"Just one?"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Armed to da Teef!
skillTree.description: "Dis ere's my choppa. Dere's many like it, but dis one is mine!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Black Orc units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Dead 'Ard
skillTree.description: "'Arder than 'ard! Dead 'ard!"

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Crack Some 'Eads!
skillTree.description: "Chop 'em up, you gitz!"

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Measured Rage
skillTree.description: Unlike their Greenskin cousins, Black Orcs do not waste their energy celebrating victories or brawling with other Greenskins. They save it all for the battle.

skillTree.name: Sharpened Choppas
skillTree.description: Black Orcs are known to maintain their weapons after battle, preferring to care for and use the same choppas until they find something better.

skillTree.name: Leading From the Front
skillTree.description: Unlike one of those sniveling goblins, a Black Orc Big Boss leads by example, charging straight into the fray.

skillTree.name: Bring it Down
skillTree.description: Any proper Greenskin relishes any chance they get to kill something bigger than them.

skillTree.name: Battle Leader
skillTree.description: Listen up you gits… right when da enemy starts to give ground, dat’s when you hit ‘em with da good stuff.

skillTree.name: Battle Drills
skillTree.description: Look, it ain’t natural for a Greenskin to ‘practice’... but it’s either dis or da Big Boss is gonna throw us in his stew.

skillTree.name: Necklace of Teef
skillTree.description: Da last would-be-assassin dat tried to kill me only had a few teef left for me to add to my necklace… so for you I’m gonna keep everything down low.

skillTree.name: Motivational Leadership
skillTree.description: No Greenskin left behind! Anyone who slows us down gets fed to da squigs.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Green Constitution
skillTree.description: Imperial scholars have theorized that Greenskins are a unique hybrid animal/fungal lifeform, which could explain how they are able to heal so quickly.

skillTree.name: Respect Da Boss
skillTree.description: Da best fighter gets to lead da tribe… and since da boss is da boss, it’s best to keep him happy.

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Bully
backgroundSkills.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -20% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc recruits
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bragga
backgroundSkills.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Mushroom-Addicted
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Serial Danca
backgroundSkills.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

backgroundSkills.name: Tortura
backgroundSkills.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Shroom Growa’
backgroundSkills.description: Da boyz prefer teef, but enjoy some quality ‘shrooms when the mood strikes.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for all units
	(all units in army)

Income from raiding: -25%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Shiny Lova’
backgroundSkills.description: Oi, listen up yooz gits. Bring da shiniest bits back to me… or else.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

backgroundSkills.name: Night Gobbo Loon
backgroundSkills.description: I love da dark places. Yoo can ‘ave so much fun with dem stunties in da dark...

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 during subterranean intercept battles
	(all units in army)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%

backgroundSkills.name: Bearded Choppas
backgroundSkills.description: It just sorta happened. After a few scraps, da stuntie’s beard-hairs were stickin’ to my choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Dwarfs

backgroundSkills.name: Beard Connoisseur
backgroundSkills.description: Whoeva’ brings me da best beard after da scrap gets a necklace o’ teef from my personal stash.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Dwarfs
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Choppa Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."

backgroundSkills.name: Stabba Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"
